verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H1980>me,<s%> Go, and <S%H7069>buy<s%> yourself a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H232>belt,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it on your <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and <S%H935>don't<s%> put it in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
So I <S%H7069>bought<s%> a <S%H232>belt<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it on my <S%H4975>waist.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to me the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> that you have <S%H7069>bought,<s%> which is on your <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H2934>hide<s%> it there in a <S%H5357>cleft<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>
So I <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> it by the <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> commanded <S%H6680>me.<s%>

It happened <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>me,<s%> Arise, <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> from <S%H6680>there,<s%> which I commanded you to hide <S%H2934>there.<s%>

Then I <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H2658>dug,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> where I had <S%H2934>hidden<s%> <S%H232>it;<s%> and behold, the belt was <S%H7843>marred,<s%> it was profitable for <S%H6743>nothing.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> In this way I will <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

This <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> who <S%H3987>refuse<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and are <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them,<s%> and to worship <S%H232>them,<s%> shall even be as this belt, which is profitable for <S%H6743>nothing.<s%>

For as the <S%H232>belt<s%> <S%H1692>clings<s%> to the <S%H4975>waist<s%> of a <S%H376>man,<s%> so have I caused to <S%H1692>cling<s%> to me the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> that they may be to me for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and for a <S%H8034>name,<s%> and for a <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and for a <S%H8597>glory:<s%> but they would not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

Therefore you shall <S%H559>speak<s%> to them this <S%H1697>word:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine:<s%> and they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> Do we not certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> that every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine?<s%>

Then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4390>Behold,<s%> I will fill all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land,<s%> even the <S%H4428>kings<s%> who <S%H3427>sit<s%> on <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> with <S%H7943>drunkenness.<s%>

I will <S%H5310>dash<s%> them <S%H376>one<s%> against <S%H251>another,<s%> even the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> I will not <S%H2550>pity,<s%> nor <S%H2347>spare,<s%> nor have <S%H7355>compassion,<s%> that I should not destroy <S%H7843>them.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> and give <S%H238>ear;<s%> <S%H1361>don't<s%> be proud; for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> before he causes <S%H2821>darkness,<s%> and before your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5062>stumble<s%> on the <S%H5399>dark<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H6960>and,<s%> while you look for <S%H216>light,<s%> he <S%H7760>turns<s%> it into the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> and <S%H7896>makes<s%> it gross <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>

But if you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5315>it,<s%> my soul shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> your <S%H1466>pride;<s%> and my <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H1830>weep<s%> <S%H1830>bitterly,<s%> and run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5739>flock<s%> is taken <S%H7617>captive.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> and to the <S%H1377>queen<s%> <S%H8213>mother,<s%> Humble <S%H3427>yourselves,<s%> sit down; for your <S%H4761>headdresses<s%> have come <S%H3381>down,<s%> even the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of your <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> are shut <S%H5462>up,<s%> and there is none to <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3063>them:<s%> Judah is carried away <S%H1540>captive,<s%> all of <S%H7965>it;<s%> it is wholly carried away <S%H1540>captive.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> those who <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north:<s%> where is the <S%H5739>flock<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8597>you,<s%> your beautiful <S%H6629>flock?<s%>

What will you <S%H559>say,<s%> when he shall <S%H6485>set<s%> over you as <S%H7218>head<s%> those whom you have yourself <S%H3925>taught<s%> to be <S%H441>friends<s%> to <S%H2256>you?<s%> shall not sorrows <S%H270>take<s%> hold of <S%H802>you,<s%> as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail?<s%>

If you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> Why are these things <S%H7122>come<s%> on <S%H7230>me?<s%> for the greatness of your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> are your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> and your <S%H6119>heels<s%> suffer <S%H2554>violence.<s%>

Can the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H2015>change<s%> his <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> his <S%H2272>spots?<s%> then <S%H3201>may<s%> you also do <S%H3190>good,<s%> who are <S%H3928>accustomed<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil.<s%>
Therefore will I <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H7179>them,<s%> as the stubble that passes <S%H5674>away,<s%> by the <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

This is your <S%H1486>lot,<s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> <S%H4055>measured<s%> to you from <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> because you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H982>me,<s%> and trusted in <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>
Therefore will I also <S%H2834>uncover<s%> your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> on your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and your <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H8251>abominations,<s%> even your <S%H5004>adulteries,<s%> and your <S%H4684>neighing,<s%> the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H3389>you,<s%> Jerusalem! You will not be made <S%H2891>clean;<s%> how long shall it yet <S%H5750>be?<s%>
